text: It just doesn't delete the language version.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
Correction: The document is deleted, but is still selectable in the site area.
The language is still displayed on the overview tab.
The label is not removed from the sitetree.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: The problem is that SiteTreeNodeImpl.removeLabel() doesn't save the sitetree XML.
